title: Opposites Attract
description: China Aster: VarietyAsher Wolfe had learned long ago that opposites could attract. Cool and controlled, Asher once had melted in the arms of a man whose fiery passion awakened her, then sent her running with a secret she could never share. Now, Ty Starbuck wanted answersâ€”and one night to remind her of what she had lost...
author: Nora Roberts
